snippet.title: Alwa's Awakening Steam Greenlight Trailer
snippet.description:
Update: Alwa's Awakening has been greenlit!

ALWA'S AWAKENING - Now on Steam Greenlight http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=695940051

It's finally here! Alwa's Awakening has arrived on Steam Greenlight! We're hoping to release later this year but we need YOUR help. Please vote YES for our game on Steam Greenlight! http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=695940051

Alwa’s Awakening is a retro game made for modern platforms but with the feel and look of a Nintendo 8-bit game. Fight enemies, solve puzzles and jump your way through this upcoming adventure game.

- An exciting new NES-inspired game for devoted retro fans!
- Equip your magic staff to make it through the many challenging rooms
- Find new items and discover new abilities to unlock new areas 
- Explore a large interconnected world map in true 'Metroidvania' style
- Listen to a completely new 8-bit soundtrack with more than 25 new original tracks
- Non-violent fun for the entire family

Please vote YES for us on Steam Greenlight! http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=695940051

http://eldenpixels.com
http://twitter.com/EldenPixels
http://facebook.com/EldenPixels

Trailer made by Dennis Bagstevold http://www.dennisbagstevold.com
